entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
